The experienced winger made a rare first-team start as the Hoops continued the countdown to the crown with a nervy, hard-fight win over a determined Dundee outfit. That’s one down and four [...]

entry.title: POINTS GIFTED TO IBROX
entry.summary: CELTIC will need to win against Dundee at Dens Park this afternoon to maintain their three-point advantage at the Premiership pinnacle. Their nearest challenges from Ibrox were gift-wrapped three points in their 2-1 victory over St Mirren in Paisley earlier today. entry.summary: EVERGREEN James Forrest is in at the start for Celtic’s crucial Premiership encounter against Dundee at Dens Park this afternoon.
